description: Display of 1 no. internally illuminated projecting sign
site_name: Lidl153 - 161 London RoadKingston Upon ThamesKT2 6NU
decision_conditions: The proposed internally projecting sign due to the cumulative impact of consented advertisements on the host building would result in the proliferation of signs on the host building and visual cluttering of the site, thereby harming the visual amenity of the surrounding area. The proposed advertisement is therefore contrary to Policies CS8 and DM10 of the Royal Borough of Kingston upon Thames Core Strategy 2012 and Policy D3 of the London Plan 2021.
